articles.author: Lisa Kailai Han
articles.title: S&P 500 futures rise after Meta and Microsoft post quarterly beats: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Tech giants Meta Platforms and Microsoft reported solid quarterly results Wednesday afternoon. Shares of both companies jumped in extended trading.
articles.content:
S&P 500 futures and Nasdaq 100 futures rose on Thursday morning following solid earnings reports from tech giants Microsoft and Meta Platforms.
S&P 500 futures jumped 0.9%, and Nasdaq 100 fu… [+2707 chars]

articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Skechers is making kids’ shoes with a hidden AirTag compartment - TechCrunch
articles.description: Skechers launches kids' shoes with a built-in AirTag holder.
articles.content:
Skechers introduced a line of kids’ sneakers that contain a hidden compartment where parents can slip in an Apple AirTag.
